main.name: Konrad Burchardt
main.bio: Freelance SEO & Web developer born in Chile, based in Germany. I currently work at Uber EMEA and do freelancing SEO optimization & tools for some clients. Previously, I worked as a SEO Analyst at The Walt Disney Company in Los Angeles, California and as a Global SEO Analyst at ESPN. I'm pursiung a masters degree in Data Engineering at Jacobs University.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: These are the skills and tools im proficient.

education.description: How to work with Javascript,Jquery, APIs and build SPA and MPA with React.

work.title: Global SEO Analyst
work.description: In charge of all SEO strategies for ESPN.com, ESPN international properties, and ESPN affiliated sites. I did weekly reporting and analysis, SEO Training, and evangelism, Product support, Finding and Fixing SEO issues and content support.

work.title: SEO Analyst
work.description: Supported SEO strategy for shopDisney.com, Espn.com, Disney.com, and Starwars.com.

work.title: SEO Associate
work.description: In charge of Club Penguin,Disney Movies, Disney Video, Disney Channel, XD, and JR. Lead successful Club Penguin migration. I managed 500K URLsand transferred all SEO auth. ASO for all mobile games andapps in Spanish.

work.title: SEO Intern
work.description: In charge of SEO for Disney ¡Ajá! and Club Penguin.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
